name: The Guild (Bd3n, A42PoundMoose, OneOh, Beniminimin)
description:
Welcome to The Guild. You will receive assignments from The Boss in the guild association. Follow your target marker and take them down to receive your bounty and combat perks. After completing the mission return to the boss for additional quests. Can you become the greatest bounty hunter the town has ever encountered? 

------------------------------------------------

Get Contract From Guild -> Kill Everyone At Location -> Repeat

------------------------------------------------

Controls: WASD to move. Left click to shoot. 

------------------------------------------------

Music:

  • Guild -  VViard 
  • Outdoors  - section31
  • Combat - Matthew Pablo 
  • Victory - Listener 

Art:

  • Kenney.nl
